verses.verse: And the men<WH376> of Ephraim<WH669> gathered themselves together,<WH6817> and went<WH5674> northward,<WH6828> and said<WH559> unto Jephthah,<WH3316> Wherefore<WH4069> passedst thou over<WH5674> to fight<WH3898> against the children<WH1121> of Ammon,<WH5983> and didst not<WH3808> call<WH7121> us to go<WH1980> with<WH5973> thee? we will burn<WH8313> thine house<WH1004> upon<WH5921> thee with fire.<WH784>

And Jephthah<WH3316> said<WH559> unto<WH413> them, I<WH589> and my people<WH5971> were<WH1961> at great strife<WH376> <WH7379> <WH3966> with the children<WH1121> of Ammon;<WH5983> and when I called<WH2199> you, ye delivered<WH3467> me not<WH3808> out of their hands.<WH4480> <WH3027>

And when I saw<WH7200> that<WH3588> ye delivered<WH3467> me not,<WH369> I put<WH7760> my life<WH5315> in my hands,<WH3709> and passed over<WH5674> against<WH413> the children<WH1121> of Ammon,<WH5983> and the LORD<WH3068> delivered<WH5414> them into my hand:<WH3027> wherefore<WH4100> then are ye come up<WH5927> unto<WH413> me this<WH2088> day,<WH3117> to fight<WH3898> against me?

Then Jephthah<WH3316> gathered together<WH6908> <WH853> all<WH3605> the men<WH376> of Gilead,<WH1568> and fought<WH3898> with<WH854> Ephraim:<WH669> and the men<WH376> of Gilead<WH1568> smote<WH5221> <WH853> Ephraim,<WH669> because<WH3588> they said,<WH559> Ye<WH859> Gileadites<WH1568> are fugitives<WH6412> of Ephraim<WH669> among<WH8432> the Ephraimites,<WH669> and among<WH8432> the Manassites.<WH4519>

And the Gileadites<WH1568> took<WH3920> <WH853> the passages<WH4569> of Jordan<WH3383> before the Ephraimites:<WH669> and it was<WH1961> so, that when<WH3588> those Ephraimites<WH669> which were escaped<WH6412> said,<WH559> Let me go over;<WH5674> that the men<WH376> of Gilead<WH1568> said<WH559> unto him, Art thou<WH859> an Ephraimite?<WH673> If he said,<WH559> Nay;<WH3808>

Then said<WH559> they unto him, Say<WH559> now<WH4994> Shibboleth:<WH7641> and he said<WH559> Sibboleth:<WH5451> for he could not<WH3808> frame<WH3559> to pronounce<WH1696> it right.<WH3651> Then they took<WH270> him, and slew<WH7819> him at<WH413> the passages<WH4569> of Jordan:<WH3383> and there fell<WH5307> at that<WH1931> time<WH6256> of the Ephraimites<WH4480> <WH669> forty<WH705> and two<WH8147> thousand.<WH505>

And Jephthah<WH3316> judged<WH8199> <WH853> Israel<WH3478> six<WH8337> years.<WH8141> Then died<WH4191> Jephthah<WH3316> the Gileadite,<WH1569> and was buried<WH6912> in one of the cities<WH5892> of Gilead.<WH1568>
And after<WH310> him Ibzan<WH78> of Bethlehem<WH4480> <WH1035> judged<WH8199> <WH853> Israel.<WH3478>

And he had<WH1961> thirty<WH7970> sons,<WH1121> and thirty<WH7970> daughters,<WH1323> whom he sent<WH7971> abroad,<WH2351> and took in<WH935> thirty<WH7970> daughters<WH1323> from<WH4480> abroad<WH2351> for his sons.<WH1121> And he judged<WH8199> <WH853> Israel<WH3478> seven<WH7651> years.<WH8141>
Then died<WH4191> Ibzan,<WH78> and was buried<WH6912> at Bethlehem.<WH1035>
And after<WH310> him Elon,<WH356> a Zebulonite,<WH2075> judged<WH8199> <WH853> Israel;<WH3478> and he judged<WH8199> <WH853> Israel<WH3478> ten<WH6235> years.<WH8141>
And Elon<WH356> the Zebulonite<WH2075> died,<WH4191> and was buried<WH6912> in Aijalon<WH357> in the country<WH776> of Zebulun.<WH2075>
And after<WH310> him Abdon<WH5658> the son<WH1121> of Hillel,<WH1985> a Pirathonite,<WH6553> judged<WH8199> <WH853> Israel.<WH3478>

And he had<WH1961> forty<WH705> sons<WH1121> and thirty<WH7970> nephews,<WH1121> <WH1121> that rode<WH7392> on<WH5921> threescore and ten<WH7657> ass colts:<WH5895> and he judged<WH8199> <WH853> Israel<WH3478> eight<WH8083> years.<WH8141>

And Abdon<WH5658> the son<WH1121> of Hillel<WH1985> the Pirathonite<WH6553> died,<WH4191> and was buried<WH6912> in Pirathon<WH6552> in the land<WH776> of Ephraim,<WH669> in the mount<WH2022> of the Amalekites.<WH6003>
